name: Fashion Doll Color Book
description:
Fashion Doll Coloring provides you the opportunity to choose over variety of doll images to paint. Fashion Doll Color Book has attractive doll designs and full range of colors. So it’s time to color the pretty princesses and dolls of the royal doll house.
Coloring is the best exercise for the mind. We give you this healthy app which also relaxes your brain muscles. We guarantee you by playing this, you'll forget your worries. It is the most versatile and expert coloring game that gives you joy and pleasure. Fashion Doll Color Book helps you keep relax while in your depression, especially best for Alzheimer’s patients. Game has a variety of shades and creative designs of dolls.

Fashion Doll Color Book Features:

Excellent HD graphics.
Wide range of coloring pages of your favorite dolls.
Color palette contains large range of attractive shades.
Fill color in shapes with color bucket.
Double tap will remove your color now try some new color.
Maximum Zoom factor.
Save your image and use as a wallpaper.
You have your own gallery where you can store all your art pieces.
Share your creativity with your friends and family.
It always feels good while coloring or painting, it keeps you relaxed. That is why TWINKLE TALES offers you best coloring app Fashion Doll Color Book loaded with amazing and cute dolls.
